Welcome to the Web Start Wizards SDK 3.0!  

Thank you for using this product.  The following summary outlines
the contents:


Roadmap.html - Future directions for this SDK and InstallShield 
               Java Edition builder tool

classes - The compiled java classes making up the SDK.

docs - API Documentation for the compiled classes.
   * README - This file
   * InstallShield_Java_Edition_Roadmap.html - Future directions
     for InstallShield's Java Edition builder product
   * docs/index.html  - Main documentation page.  Links to all other documentation
                   can befound here.

samples - Sample code to illustrate basic SDK usage.  Several examples can be
          found here.

We hope you enjoy the SDK!

- The Web Start Wizards Team
